items.text: Missing camera from Reykjavik area, was on sale here this evening by username Vonkilkk.  Add now removed after being in touch with the user. Please do not buy from this person and anyone with any info about this user please share.   Camera is a nikon d5500 brand new with attachements and did have all our pictures from our honeymoon in Iceland.
items.title: Camera stolen

items.text: get in touch with the police with all the info you have.
